name: Gobble Trouble
description:
Gobble Trouble is a game of survival. Set your friends up to fall into the endless abyss by pushing them over the side of the map, swapping places with them or obstructing their path. Each player has 6 lives at the beginning of the match, keep and eye out for the enviroment and be the last man standing to win!

Credits

Hussein Taher - Programming

Anton Pilmark - Level Design, Music

Joshua Christiansen - Level Design, Scripting
